info.title: FT Lightning Data API
info.description:
FTLightning API provides REST access to FastTrack investment data for our 30k+ funds, ETFs, stocks, and indexes. The data includes dividend adjusted closing prices back to 1988, derived statistics and portfolio models. 

Visit https://apitrial.fasttrack.net for a trial account. 

Search the FastTrack database here: https://ftcloud.fasttrack.net/web/search

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: account number

parameters.name: pass
parameters.description: password

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id received with sign up email

get.description: Server authentication. The returned token must be passed as a header with all other API calls
Retrieve a single ticker's adjusted and unadjusted closing, open, high low, and volume data over the data range

200.description: data points associated with ticker and parameters

post.description: Retrieve multiple ticker's adjusted and unadjusted closing, open, high low, and volume data over the data range

get.description: Returns all data for the entire data range of a single ticker. Entire date range is 9/1/1988 to the most recent market day.

post.description: Returns all data for the entire data range of multiple tickers. Entire date range is 9/1/1988 to the most recent market day.

get.description: Returns ticker's dividend adjusted closing prices for all days in FastTrack database. All other objects are null
Returns ticker's unadjusted closing prices for all days in FastTrack database. All other objects are null
Returns ticker's start date. All other objects are null
Returns ticker's name. All other objects are null
Returns array with every date in the FastTrack database. This object is used to interpret the data/{ticker}/divadjprices and data/{ticker}/unadjprices results
A "family" is a group of ticker symbols created by FastTrack. This function returns the requested family. Requested name must match FastTrack's family name exactly, CASE INSENSITIVE

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Text to search all families

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: if set to 'onlyticker', search will only return families that contain the exact ticker specified by 's'

get.description: A "family" is a group of ticker symbols created by FastTrack. This function searches all FastTrack families by family name, family partial name, and family members (tickers).
Returns calulated statistics on a single ticker over the date range

post.description: Returns calulated statistics on multiple ticker over the date range

200.description: data points associated with static model

post.description: Calculates the specified portfolio over the specifed rebalance period

start.description: Model's start date. The first date the model is allocated to 'weights'. All dates prior are money market returns. Calendar, Julian, or market dates are accepted

rebalanceperiod.description: Specify the rebalance frequency. This is how often the portfolio trades.

marginrate.description: annual percent interest on borrowed money. All interest is accrued quarterly.

seed.description: value of portfolio on the first day of trading

200.description: data points associated with static models

post.description: Calculates the specified portfolios over the specifed rebalance period

start.description: Model's start date. The first date the model is allocated to 'weights'. All dates prior are money market returns. Calendar, Julian, or market dates are accepted

marginrate.description: annual percent interest on borrowed money. All interest is accrued quarterly.

seed.description: value of portfolio on the first day of trading

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: 36 characher GUID received from welcome email. Sign up for trial at http://apitrial.fasttrack.net

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Temporary token received from auth/login end point

200.description: CSV file with dates and closing prices

get.description: Returns a CSV file of a single ticker's adjusted/unadjusted closing prices.
Retrieve all dividends for a specific ticker

schema.description: simple HTML webpage that renders in any browser

parameters.name: colors
parameters.description: comma separated values for chart line colors. color order is applied the same as "tickers". Specify hex code and do not include "#"

parameters.name: fore
parameters.description: foreground (text) color of chart and report in hex code (do not include "#")

parameters.name: bg
parameters.description: background color of chart and report in hex code (do not include "#")

parameters.name: showdates
parameters.description: toggle to show or hide date selectors on chart

parameters.name: showheader
parameters.description: toggle to show or hide header on report

parameters.name: showreport
parameters.description: toggle to show or hide header of report

parameters.name: basis
parameters.description: Basis used for correlation, beta, sharpe ratio, ulcer performance index

parameters.name: tickers
parameters.description: comma separated list of tickers to display in chart, and report

parameters.name: datebuttons
parameters.description: comma separated list of date shortcut buttons to show. defined as number of months ie 24 = two years, 60 = 5 years

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: authentication token returned from the /login endpoint

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: application id assigned at account opening

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: First day in the date range of all calculations/requests

get.description: Embed custom FastTrack charts on your webpage with an iframe.
Returns category and expense ratio of ticker \*\***Must use https://FTL.fasttrack.net/v1 server** \*\*
Get mutual fund or ETF's top ten positions, sector weighting, and net 1 year flows \*\***Must use https://FTL.fasttrack.net/v1 server** \*\*

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: curor position of search results. ie index of first result to return. Use this to page through results

parameters.name: fq
parameters.description: filter options. Use 1 for Funds, 2 for ETFs, 3 for Stocks, and 15 for indexes.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: text or phrase to search for

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: number of results to return

start.description: start index of search results (used in paging through results)

score.description: items relevance score relative to search term

db.description: security type: 1 = Funds, 2 = ETF, 3 = Stock, 15 = Index

get.description: Search the fasttrack database accross ticker, name, and cusip

post.description: returns reference data for portfolio and portfolio positions

Token.description: authentication token to include in all other API request.

FTData.description: Contains various pricing data points for a single ticker. View [docs] (https://stoplight.io/p/docs/gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/Examples/02-date_javascript.md?srn=gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/Examples/02-date_javascript.md#data-date-translation]) for information on pricing array translation to dates

prices.description: Array of closing prices. Array is always length of FTDates. Index 1 is ticker's closing price of first market day in FastTrack database (9/1/1988), Index 2 is the second market day (9/2/1988), index 3 is third market day in FastTrack database (9/6/88)

unadjprices.description: Array of unadjusted closing prices in same format as 'prices' object. Requests must use 'unadj' paramter to specifically request this data and it is limited to the trailing 3 years of data. Subscriptions for complete date range are available.

strstartmarketday.description: First day of data for ticker symbol. YYYY-MM-DD format.

intstartmarketday.description: First day of data for symbol. [Market day format](https://stoplight.io/p/docs/gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/Examples/02-date_javascript.md?srn=gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/Examples/02-date_javascript.md#market-days)

volumes.description: Array of daily volumes. Array is always length of FTDates. Index 1 is ticker's closing price of first market day in FastTrack database (9/1/1988), Index 2 is the second market day (9/2/1988), index 3 is third market day in FastTrack database (9/6/88)

opens.description: Array of open prices. Array is always length of FTDates. Index 1 is ticker's closing price of first market day in FastTrack database (9/1/1988), Index 2 is the second market day (9/2/1988), index 3 is third market day in FastTrack database (9/6/88)

lows.description: Array of dialy low prices. Array is always length of FTDates. Index 1 is ticker's closing price of first market day in FastTrack database (9/1/1988), Index 2 is the second market day (9/2/1988), index 3 is third market day in FastTrack database (9/6/88)

highs.description: Array of daily high prices. Array is always length of FTDates. Index 1 is ticker's closing price of first market day in FastTrack database (9/1/1988), Index 2 is the second market day (9/2/1988), index 3 is third market day in FastTrack database (9/6/88)

FTDataList.description: List of FTDataList objects containing bulk pricing data for multiple tickers

FTDataRange.description: Describes data for a specific date range

datarange.description: Array of FTPrice objects containing adjusted and unadjusted prices for date range.

FTDataRangeList.description: List of FTDataRAnge objects containing pricing data for multiple tickers over a date range

open.description: adjusted daily open price of ticker

high.description: adjusted daily high price of ticker

low.description: adjusted daily low price of ticker

FTPrice.description: Various pricing pricing data points for a single day

maxnumdays.description: maximum number of market days in the FastTrack database

strmaxnumdays.description: The last day in the FastTrack database

dtes.description: Array of FTDate objects for every day in the database. Every market day in the database is included in the array. Index 0 is a repeate of index 1.

FTDates.description: This object contains all date information for FastTrack. There are "MaxNumDays" in the database. All prices and date arrays are sized "MaxNumdays". The index of the array is also the market day of that value. A date's market day is number of market days elapsed since 9/1/88, the first day in the FastTrack database.

marketdate.description: market days ellapsed since the first day in the database (9/1/88)

FTDate.description: Contains date information of a single date

tickers.description: String of comma "," separated ticker that make up family.

FTReturns.description: Object containing various annualized/total return values and history of yearly total returns

years.description: array containing total return, by year, of the ticker

year.description: Year total return is calculated (Jan 1 to Dec 31)

FTYearReturns.description: Year and total return value for that year

FTRisk.description: Various risk and statistical measure of a security.

alpha.description: alpha -  a measure of outperformance versus a the benchmark

beta.description: beta against the ticker defined in the basis parameter, or Dividend Adjusted S&P500 data as a default. Correlation lenth is set via the "len" parameter or defaulted to 21 market days (approximately 1 month)

corr.description: correlation against the ticker defined in the basis parameter, or Dividend Adjusted S&P500 data as a default. Correlation lenth is set via the "len" parameter or defaulted to 21 market days (approximately 1 month)

ftalpha.description: FastTrack proprietary calculation measuring risk, return, and correlation

sd.description: standard deviation over the time period

sharpe.description: sharpe ration against the ticker defined in the basis parameter, or Dividend Adjusted S&P500 data as a default

ui.description: ulcer index over the time period

upi.description: ulcer performance index against the ticker defined in the basis parameter, or Dividend Adjusted S&P500 data as a default

r_squared.description: Coefficient of determination - the percentage of a fund or security's movements that can be explained by movements in a basis

sharesout.description: number of shares outstanding at the most recent quarter end

marketcap.description: number of shares outstanding multiplied by the most recent closing price

high_52.description: adjusted closing price of the 52 week high from the "end" parameter

low_52.description: adjusted closing price of the 52 week low from the "end" parameter

yield.description: SEC yield for the priod 52 weeks from the "end" parameter

price_previous.description: Closing price for the day before "end date"

security_type.description: ETF, Mutual Fund, Stock, or Index

yield_all.description: 52 week yield of all dividend types (income, short and long)

FTDescribe.description: Various descriptive data points of security

FTStats.description: various stats and data points for a ticker or model

aux.description: describes the order which tickers were received.

p_percents2.description: percent return from start date data

p_log.description: log adjusted percent return from start date  data (p_percents2)

FTChartData.description: Pre calculated data used to draw charts

maxdrawdown.description: maximum observed loss of a time period.

maxdrawlength.description: length of time, in months, of the maximum draw down

recoverylength.description: lenth of time, in months, of time to reach a new peak after reaching draw down bottom

valleydate.description: day the drawdown reached it bottom

err.description: error responses. see full list of error codes [here](https://stoplight.io/p/docs/gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/01b-Errors.md?srn=gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/01b-Errors.md)

code.description: numeric code of error. see full list of error codes [here](https://stoplight.io/p/docs/gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/01b-Errors.md?srn=gh/investors-fasttrack/ftlightning/docs/01b-Errors.md)

modeldetails.description: array containing the break down of all positions for each day of the model

FTModelResults.description: Details and stats of portfolio model results

totalvalue.description: Total dollar value of portfolio (change from $100,000 on model's start date)

value.description: dollar value of position. Only used in return result

FTInfoPortfolio.description: Describes a funds or ETFs holdings
FTInfoPortfolio.title: FTInfoPortfolio

ft.description: FastTrack's mapped index, based on security's category, style, and correlations

flows.description: Subscription required - Flows in and out of fund

assetclass.description: Percentage weighting of holdings by asset class

region.description: Percentage weighting of holdings by region

sector.description: Percentage weighting of holding by sector

FTReturn.description: Annualized (CAGR) / Total returns for the described time periods

period.description: annualized/total dividend adjusted return from start to end

one.description: one year annualized/total return from the "end" parameter

three.description: three year annualized/total return from the "end" parameter

five.description: five year annualized/total return from the "end" parameter

ten.description: ten year annualized/total return from the "end" parameter

ytd.description: year to date annualized/total return from the "end" parameter

numdivs.description: number of dividends returned in the response

type.description: Income, Short Term, or Long Term

expenseratio.description: Expense ratio (multiply by 100 to get percentage value)

start.description: Model's start date. The first date the model is allocated to 'weights'. All dates prior are money market returns.

rebalanceperiod.description: Specify the rebalance frequency. This is how often the portfolio trades.

marginrate.description: annual percent interest on borrowed money. All interest is accrued quarterly.

seed.description: value of portfolio on the first day of trading

appid.name: appid
appid.description: 36 characher GUID received from welcome email. Sign up for trial at http://apitrial.fasttrack.net

token.name: token
token.description: 36 characher GUID received from the auth/login end point

riskfree.name: riskfree
riskfree.description: ticker or % rate of return used as the "risk free rate" in alpha calculation. Default is VMMXX, Vanguard Money Market Fund

start.name: start
start.description: First day in the date range of all calculations/requests

end.name: end
end.description: Last day in the date range of all calculations/requests. If not provided, the last market day in the database is used

d.name: d
d.description: Use this to return a single date in the "data/{ticker}/range" function. This over rides any value set for start and end.

unadj.name: unadj
unadj.description: Flag to include or exclude unadjusted prices. Only trailing 3 years of unadjusted data is available. -1 is returned on any prior date request

olhv.name: olhv
olhv.description: Flag to include or exclude open, low, high, and volume data in on the /data/{ticker}/range and /data/{ticker} endpoints. -1 is returned on any prior date request

basis.name: basis
basis.description: Basis used for correlation, beta, sharpe ratio, ulcer performance index

len.name: len
len.description: Correlation length, described in market days

maxdraw.name: maxdraw
maxdraw.description: Includes or exclude max draw data data in result. Max draw is a HEAVY calculation, so ommit when not necessary to improve performance

chart.name: chart
chart.description: Include or exclude chart data in result. Chart data is substantually larger than other data and substantually increase the size of the result. Only request if necessary.

count.name: count
count.description: Total number of datapoints returned in the FTChartData object. This helps improve API response time and minimizes the data loaded into charts. Value must be A to return ALL data points or a number greater than 0

monthend.name: monthend
monthend.description: convert all calculated date ranges to month end. ie 1 year return from 6/28/2019 will calculate back to 6/29/2018 (the last market day of the month) instead of 6/28/2018.

yield.name: yield
yield.description: flag to include or exclude yield

details.name: details

schema.description: include or exclude "modeldetails" object in resutl. Pass "0" to reduce result size.

details.description: include or exclude "modeldetails" object in resutl. Pass "0" to reduce result size.

appid.name: appid
appid.description: 36 characher GUID received from welcome email. Sign up for trial at [http://apitrial.fasttrack.net](http://apitrial.fasttrack.net)

token.name: token
token.description: Temporary token received from auth/login end point
